# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported |
|---------|-----------|
| Latest release | Yes |
| Previous minor | Best effort |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please report security vulnerabilities to **security@hatidata.com**.

- We will acknowledge your report within 48 hours
- We will provide a detailed response within 5 business days
- We will work with you to understand and resolve the issue

**Do not** open a public GitHub issue for security vulnerabilities.

## Scope

This policy covers the SDKs and integrations in this repository.

Server-side components (proxy, control plane) are maintained in a separate private repository. Report those vulnerabilities to the same email address.

## Disclosure

We follow responsible disclosure practices and will credit reporters in our security advisories unless they prefer to remain anonymous.
